title: Web
seo_description: Room, tax and fee will be charged upon booking; reservation is non-refundable and does not allow date changes. Rooms purchased in advance are not transferable and may not be resold
short_description: Room, tax and fee will be charged upon booking; reservation is non-refundable and does not allow date changes. Rooms purchased in advance are not transferable and may not be resold
full_description:
Room, tax and fee will be charged upon booking; reservation is non-refundable and does not allow date changes. Rooms purchased in advance are not transferable and may not be resold

A nightly Residents Fee of $47 plus tax per adult is conveniently added to your folio and covers a vast array of bespoke, and unlimited, InResidence privileges:

  • Sweet and savory breakfast presentations
  • Barista bar and non-alcoholic beverages available all day
  • Hours of Indulgence, light fare and curated selection of alcoholic beverages served daily
  • High-speed Wi-Fi access
  • Local and toll-free phone calls
  • 24-hour Fitness Center, on the 3rd floor
  • 24-hour business center services
  • Bottled water in-room
